Headline: Normal Red Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Red Line trains are running with delays after signal problems at 95th/Dan Ryan. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Red Line trains are running with delays after signal problems at 95th/Dan Ryan.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Pulaski
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to a door problem on a train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
